algorithm_technique: Convert dates to day-of-year and find the intersection of two date ranges.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the number of overlapping days Alice and Bob are in Rome.
problem_summary_technical: Converts MM-DD dates to day-of-year using prefix sums of days in months, then finds the intersection of the two intervals.
key_insights: The problem simplifies to finding the intersection of two intervals on a timeline.
Converting dates to a single numerical representation (day of year) is essential.
Prefix sums are an efficient way to calculate cumulative days up to a certain month.
